mapper.select: select * from board order by WRITE_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (BOARDNUM, TITLE, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, RECOMMAND, CONTENT, PASSWORD) values (boardNum_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{nickname}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{content}, #{password})
mapper.update: update board set TITLE = #{title}, WRITER = #{nickname}, CONTENT = #{content}, PASSWORD = #{password} where BOARDNUM like #{boardNum}
mapper.delete: delete from board where BOARDNUM like #{boardNum}
